text: Læa rea di prathan hlakthan xan chad cæng thanghlay kæ phwk khea keiyw kab reuxng ni phwk khea midi khadyæng kan wentæ hlakkar di mi khwam ru mayang phwk khea læwtæ neuxngcak khwam risʹya rahwang phwk khea kanxeng thæcring phracea ca thrng tadsin rahwang phwk khea nı wan ki ya mahˌ nı sing thi phwk khea di khadyæng kan nı reuxng nan
